About US


Deco Depot is a furniture-producing company which items can be characterized as unique, non-conformist and authentic – never boring and always full of imagination and inspiration.


Deco Depot succeeds for years in tracking down style icons, developing trends and innovations in furniture design, and using them to fulfil the dreams of furnishing enthusiasts.


With the courage to innovate, Deco Depot creates trends and unique furnishing collections being affordable and desirable for all people. As an international supplier and generator of change Deco Depot continues creating new furnishing designs and art objects.

Exclusive design

Mixture of imagination, experience and professionalism is the secret of our design!.


Professional Team

We are proud of our amicable, professional and always developing team!


Reasonable Prices

We produce furniture to fulfill needs of all people and offer it at affordable and fair prices
